name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Accomplished Senior Threat Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing high-performing security solutions and incident response strategies. Proficient in **SIEM**, **SOAR**, **EDR**, and cloud platforms including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, ensuring seamless integration and automation. Solid expertise in utilizing **Splunk**, **CrowdStrike**, **Microsoft Defender**, and **ServiceNow** to enhance security frameworks and incident response capabilities. Strong analytical skills complemented by a background in automation and forensics tools such as **FTK**, **Encase**, and **Malware** analysis. Known for excellent communication skills and a collaborative approach, driving impactful projects at leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, while leveraging the power of modern tech stacks such as **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) to innovate and improve security measures.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented SIEM solutions using **Splunk** to enhance incident detection and response capabilities across cloud environments.
Engineered secure and scalable authentication systems utilizing **OAuth** and **Azure AD B2C**, ensuring compliance with security protocols and regulations.
Designed and deployed automated workflows on **Azure**, leveraging **ServiceNow** for incident management and streamline operations with **M365** integrations.
Developed and integrated automated incident response protocols using **CrowdStrike** and **Sentinel**, enabling rapid mitigation of threats and vulnerabilities.
Conducted forensic analyses with tools like **FTK**, **EnCase**, and **SIFT**, ensuring thorough investigation and documentation of security incidents.
Led cross-functional communication efforts to improve system integration for **EDR** solutions and enhance the overall security posture of the organization.
Collaborated with Purple Team initiatives to identify vulnerabilities and implement proactive measures, leading to a **25%** reduction in security incidents year-over-year.
Trained junior engineers on emerging threats and response strategies, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and analytical thinking in cybersecurity workflows.

• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes, increasing efficiency by **25%**.
• Created event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests, reducing processing time by **30%**.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to maintain consistent and scalable environments with a **99.9%** uptime.
• Engineered data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data, using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline the data flow, improving data transfer efficiency by **40%**.
• Performed security audits with a focus on **Incident Response** and **Forensics**, ensuring compliance with industry standards, and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage authentication and secure access controls, reducing security incidents by **15%**.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, utilizing strong **communication** and **analytical** skills to ensure smooth system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management.

• Developed and maintained **Cloud**-based threat detection systems using **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to enhance security operations.
• Implemented **SIEM** solutions utilizing **Splunk** and **Microsoft Sentinel** for real-time monitoring and incident response.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to manage **EDR** solutions, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and improving incident response times by **25%**.
• Integrated authentication protocols including **OAuth**, **SAML**, and **JWT** to bolster system security and streamline user management.
• Automated security processes by implementing solutions with **ServiceNow** and **Okta**, increasing efficiency and reducing manual workload by **30%**.
• Conducted thorough forensic analysis using tools such as **FTK**, **Encase**, and **X-Ways** to investigate incidents and produce actionable insights, improving incident resolution times by **40%**.
• Streamlined communication of security incidents and responses through effective documentation practices, enhancing team collaboration and information sharing across all levels.
• Engaged in **Purple Team** exercises to innovate and improve existing security measures, leveraging analytical skills to identify vulnerabilities in the structure.
